label: Da Vinci Switch Default
overview: The Da Vinci wall controller is a Multi Chanel Z-Wave device that contains up to 6 relays and up to 9 touch buttons that can be set to control either the relays (On/Off switches and shutters) or any other on/off (SWITCH_BINARY)  , shutter (MULTILEVEL_SWITCH) Z-Wave device.

parameters.label: EP 1 Type
parameters.overview:
1 = switch on/off

2 = blind up

3 = blind down

4 = switch multiway

5 = blind-up multiway

6 = blind-down multiway

parameters.label: EP 1 Button attribute
parameters.overview:
Bit [0] = LED enable
Bit [1] = Sound enable
Bit [2] = Dry contact enable
Bit [3] = Motor enable
